entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: ayanchyaziz123/Advanced-Meeting-Intelligence-frontend: NGI Meeting Transcription & Summarization Platform is a lightweight AI-powered SaaS tool designed for private associations to enhance meeting productivity by transcribing and summarizing recordings (Zoom, Teams, in-person audio), generating structured notes with agenda items, decisions, and action items, supporting multiple languages and platforms.
entry.content: NGI Meeting Transcription & Summarization Platform is a lightweight AI-powered SaaS tool designed for private associations to enhance meeting productivity by transcribing and summarizing recordings (Zoom, Teams, in-person audio), generating structured notes with agenda items, decisions, and action items, supporting multiple languages and platforms.

entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
entry.content: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: EricSkylar1/Bot-Blackjack: Bot Blackjack is a simple JavaScript simulation of the classic card game where two bots play against each other. It features core Blackjack logic, bot decision-making, and a turn-based system. Built with clean, vanilla JavaScript, this project demonstrates game flow, randomness, and AI behavior in a lightweight environment.
entry.content: Bot Blackjack is a simple JavaScript simulation of the classic card game where two bots play against each other. It features core Blackjack logic, bot decision-making, and a turn-based system. Built with clean, vanilla JavaScript, this project demonstrates game flow, randomness, and AI behavior in a lightweight environment.
